issues.environment: Green issues are universal. Regardless of creed, class, colour or culture; when the environment goes, we’re all finished. As more people tune out from the same old stale, ideologically bankrupt, political arguments as before, the Greens are a real beacon for those who want something new.

leaflet.personalStatement: Rashid Nix is a community campaigner who went to Peckham Manor School and is widely known in Brixton. He entered politics via the Westminster Race Equality Council in 1999, stood as a prospective Councillor in Coldharbour Park in 2014 and has campaigned against tenants' evictions from Estates such as Loughborough Park, SW9.

politicalExperience.achievements: campaigned against tenants' evictions from Estates such as Loughborough Park, SW9
